solution_line_template: If the final number of geese was {final_geese_in_formation}, which included the {geese_joined_from_trees} that joined from the trees, then before these {geese_joined_from_trees} joined, there were {final_geese_in_formation}-{geese_joined_from_trees}=<<{final_geese_in_formation}-{geese_joined_from_trees}={geese_before_joining}>>{geese_before_joining} geese in the sky.

Since these {geese_before_joining} geese represent the half of geese remaining, then the initial formation contained {geese_before_joining}*{half_multiplier}=<<{geese_before_joining}*{half_multiplier}={initial_formation_geese}>>{initial_formation_geese} geese.
